statements.select: select a.ID,UserName,UserPwd,ui.name as TrueName,Serils,b.DepartmentName as Department,ui.DepartmentId, c.PostName,ui.email as EmailStr,IfLogin,a.FenjiHao,a.ShortCode,a.DeskBj, ui.Sex,BackInfo,ui.telephone as Shouji,Gsdianhua,State,ui.PostId,a.Sn,ActiveTime,ui.statusid as Status, FirstLogin,LastLoginTime,version,d.Name as PostLevelName from Sys_User a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.ID=ui.userid left join Sys_Department b on b.id=ui.departmentid left join Sys_Post c on c.id=ui.postid left join CT_Sys_PostLevelName d on c.postLevel = d.id where a.ID = #value#
select ui.name as TrueName from Sys_User us left join sys_userinfo ui on us.id=ui.userid where us.ID in($value$)

select a.ID,UserName,UserPwd,ui.name as TrueName,Serils,b.DepartmentName as Department,ui.DepartmentId, c.PostName,ui.email as EmailStr,IfLogin,a.FenjiHao,a.ShortCode,a.DeskBj, ui.Sex,BackInfo,ui.telephone as Shouji,Gsdianhua,State,ui.PostId,a.Sn,ActiveTime,ui.statusid as Status, FirstLogin,LastLoginTime,version,d.Name as PostLevelName from Sys_User a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.ID=ui.userid left join Sys_Department b on b.id=ui.departmentid left join Sys_Post c on c.id=ui.postid left join CT_Sys_PostLevelName d on c.postLevel = d.id where a.State <> 9
a.UserName = #UserName#
a.UserPwd = #UserPwd#
order by a.Sn Desc

select a.ID,UserName,UserPwd,ui.name as TrueName,Serils,b.DepartmentName as Department,ui.DepartmentId, c.PostName,ui.email as EmailStr,IfLogin,a.FenjiHao,a.ShortCode,a.DeskBj, ui.Sex,BackInfo,ui.telephone as Shouji,Gsdianhua,State,ui.PostId,a.Sn,ActiveTime,ui.statusid as Status, FirstLogin,LastLoginTime,version,d.Name as PostLevelName from Sys_User a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.ID=ui.userid left join Sys_Department b on b.id=ui.departmentid left join Sys_Post c on c.id=ui.postid left join CT_Sys_PostLevelName d on c.postLevel = d.id where a.State <> 9 and a.UserName = #value#

select a.ID,UserName,UserPwd,ui.name as TrueName,Serils,b.DepartmentName as Department,ui.DepartmentId, c.PostName,ui.email as EmailStr,IfLogin,a.FenjiHao,a.ShortCode,a.DeskBj, ui.Sex,BackInfo,ui.telephone as Shouji,Gsdianhua,State,ui.PostId,a.Sn,ActiveTime,ui.statusid as Status, FirstLogin,LastLoginTime,version from Sys_User a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.ID=ui.userid left join Sys_Department b on b.id=ui.departmentid left join Sys_Post c on c.id=ui.postid where a.State <> 9 and ui.telephone is not null and ui.telephone <> '' and ui.name = #value# order by a.Sn Desc

select a.ID,UserName,UserPwd,ui.name as TrueName,Serils,b.DepartmentName as Department,ui.DepartmentId, c.PostName,ui.email as EmailStr,IfLogin,a.FenjiHao,a.ShortCode,a.DeskBj, ui.Sex,BackInfo,ui.telephone as Shouji,Gsdianhua,State,ui.PostId,a.Sn,ActiveTime,ui.statusid as Status, FirstLogin,LastLoginTime,version,d.Name as PostLevelName from Sys_User a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.ID=ui.userid left join Sys_Department b on b.id=ui.departmentid left join Sys_Post c on c.id=ui.postid left join CT_Sys_PostLevelName d on c.postLevel = d.id where a.State <> 9
a.ID in ($IdList$)
a.UserName like #UserName#
a.UserName = #UserNameAll#
a.UserName like #OrUserName# Or ui.Name like #OrTrueName#
ui.name like #TrueName#
ui.name = #TrueNameAll#
b.DepartmentName like #Department#
c.PostName like #PostName#
(ui.email is not null and len(ui.email) > 5 )
(ui.StatusID = 1 or ui.StatusID = 5)
ui.telephone is not null and ui.telephone <> ''
ui.StatusID = #Status#
ui.PostId in ($PostIdList$)
ui.DepartmentId in ($DepartmentIdList$)
IfLogin = #IfLogin#
ui.PostId = #PostId#
a.ID not in (select userid from sys_userinfo where empid is not null and userid is not null)
order by a.Sn

select a.ID,UserName,UserPwd,ui.name as TrueName,Serils,b.DepartmentName as Department,ui.DepartmentId, c.PostName,ui.email as EmailStr,IfLogin,a.FenjiHao,a.ShortCode,a.DeskBj, ui.Sex,BackInfo,ui.telephone as Shouji,Gsdianhua,State,ui.PostId,a.Sn,ActiveTime,ui.statusid as Status, FirstLogin,LastLoginTime,version,d.Name as PostLevelName from Sys_User a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.ID=ui.userid left join Sys_Department b on b.id=ui.departmentid left join Sys_Post c on c.id=ui.postid left join CT_Sys_PostLevelName d on c.postLevel = d.id left join Sys_UserJSRel e on e.SysUserId=a.id where a.State <> 9

statements.update: update Sys_User set UserName = #UserName#, UserPwd = #UserPwd#, Serils=#Serils#, IfLogin=#IfLogin#, BackInfo=#BackInfo#, Gsdianhua=#Gsdianhua#, State = #State#, Sn=#Sn#, version=#version#, FenjiHao= #FenjiHao#, ShortCode = #ShortCode#, DeskBj=#DeskBj# where ID = #ID#
statements.delete: update Sys_User set State = 9 where ID in ($value$)
update Sys_User set State = 9 where id != 1
statements.select: select ID,ParentID,TxlID,TrueName,UserName,Sex,DepartmentID,PostID, Department,PostName,EmailStr,shouji,gsdianhua,Sn,version,FenjiHao,ShortCode from( select ID,0 as TxlID,0 as ParentID,GroupName as TrueName,'' as UserName,'' as Sex,'' as DepartmentID,'' as PostID, '' as Department,'' as PostName,'' as EmailStr,'' as shouji,'' as gsdianhua,'' as Sn,'' as version,'' as FenjiHao,'' as ShortCode from OA_Group where SysUserID=#UserID# union select a.ID * -1 as ID ,TxlID,GroupID as ParentID,ui.name as TrueName,UserName,ui.Sex,ui.DepartmentID,ui.PostID, c.departmentname as Department,d.PostName,ui.email as EmailStr,ui.telephone as shouji,gsdianhua,a.Sn,version,b.FenjiHao,b.ShortCode from OA_GroupSub a left join sys_User b on b.ID = a.TxlID * -1 left join sys_userinfo ui on b.ID=ui.userid left join Sys_Department c on c.id=ui.departmentid left join Sys_Post d on d.id=ui.postid where a.TxlID < 0 and b.state <> 9 ) c
statements.update: update Sys_User set FirstLogin = 1, LastLoginTime = #LastLoginTime# where id = #ID#
update Sys_User set IfLogin =#IfLogin# where id = #ID#
statements.select: select a.ID*-1 as ID,ui.Name,ui.DepartmentId as ParentId from sys_user a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.id=ui.userid where state <> 9 union select ID,DepartmentName as Name,ParentId from sys_department where valid = 1 and delstate = 0

select ID,Name,ParentId from (select a.ID*-1 as ID,ui.Name,ui.DepartmentId as ParentId from sys_user a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.id=ui.userid where state <> 9 union select ID,DepartmentName as Name,ParentId from sys_department where valid = 1 and delstate = 0) t where t.ParentId = $id$
select top 50 a.ID,ui.Name,ui.DepartmentId as ParentId from sys_user a left join sys_userinfo ui on a.id=ui.userid where state <> 9 and ui.name like '%' + #value# + '%'

SELECT ID, Name, GongHao,ParentId,DepartmentID,DepartmentName,PostID ,PostName,Tel,ShouJi,Email,FenjiHao,ShortCode,Workstate,HelpUser ,StartTime,EndTime,IsOnline,icon,ZhaoPian FROM ( SELECT ID, DepartmentName as Name, '' as GongHao, ParentId ,0 as DepartmentID,'' as DepartmentName, 0 as PostID,'' as PostName,TelStr as Tel ,'' as ShouJi,'' as Email,'' as FenjiHao,'' as ShortCode,'' as Workstate,'' as HelpUser ,null as StartTime,null as EndTime,0 as IsOnline,'' as icon,'' as ZhaoPian FROM Sys_Department where Valid = 1 and DelState = 0
UNION
SELECT U.ID*-1 as ID, TrueName as Name,U.Serils AS GongHao, U.DepartmentID as ParentId ,U.DepartmentID, Department AS DepartmentName, U.PostID,PostName,gsdianhua AS Tel ,ShouJi, EmailStr as Email, FenjiHao,ShortCode, CUWS.Name as Workstate,U1.NAME AS HelpUser ,UWS.StartTime,UWS.EndTime,0 as IsOnline,'' as icon,EMP.ZhaoPian FROM V_User U LEFT JOIN Sys_User_WorkState UWS ON U.ID=UWS.UserID LEFT JOIN CT_Sys_User_WorkState CUWS ON UWS.WorkStateID=CUWS.ID LEFT JOIN Sys_UserInfo U1 ON UWS.HelpUser=U1.UserID and U1.UserID!=-1 LEFT JOIN Sys_Department de on u.DepartmentID =de.ID and de.Valid = 1 and de.DelState = 0 LEFT JOIN Sys_Userinfo UI ON U.id=UI.UserID LEFT JOIN HR_Employee EMP ON Ui.EMPID=EMP.ID WHERE State != 9 and (Status=1 or Status=5) ) a
